amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for energy conservation and efficiency programs by $40 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for energy conservation funding by $40 million with $16 million for weatherization assistance grants, $4 million for State energy conservation grants, $10 million for building technology programs, $5 million for industry programs, and $5 million for transportation programs.

action.text: On agreeing to the Skaggs amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 212 - 213 (Roll No. 313).
